title: How to Make Smileys on Facebook Chat

steps.headline: Type the Smiley that you want to use.
Use the Emoticon button.
steps.description: Click the Smiley face to the right of the text entry field to open the emoticon menu. Click the Smiley tab and then choose your emoticon. Not all of the Smileys in the table above will be listed in the emoticon menu.

steps.headline: Click the Emoticon button in the text entry field.
steps.description: This is only present in Facebook chat and when leaving a comment on a post.

steps.headline: Click the "+" button in the top-left corner of the emoticon menu.
steps.description: This will open the Sticker Store.

steps.headline: Find a pack of stickers you want to add.
steps.description: Most, if not all, of the sticker packs will be free.

steps.headline: Click the "Free" button to add the sticker pack to your account.
Close the Sticker Store to return to the emoticon menu.
Select your newly-added sticker pack from the row of tabs along the top.
Click a sticker to send it.
steps.description: The sticker will be sent as soon as you click it.
